key_risks: Profitability challenges due to consistent net losses despite revenue growth
Intense competition from established players like Teladoc and Castlight Health
Dependence on employer-sponsored health plans, making revenue vulnerable to economic shifts
controversies: Data breach leading to a class-action lawsuit
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities despite recent leadership changes
social_issues: Data privacy and security concerns impacting customer trust
Expansion of mental health services addressing workplace mental health needs
governance_issues: Cybersecurity leadership changes following a data breach
Potential regulatory penalties due to data privacy issues
